column5: Trolling for specks and got this bruiser.  what do you guys think? 9 or 12 pounds? I'm 9'2" 400 lbs of pure muscle. As William Wallace would say ..."fireballs from his eyes and lightening bolts from his arse".
Now thats a nice find RC. Beautiful crisp colors on that buckemouth
Those must be some huge aviators.  Nice fish.
and Bull from his mouth...  nice fish!  I put it at a new PB at 19.5?     inches that is...
He(the fish ) has a bit gut on him. 4.2 lbs
or a new WR at 19.5 hahaha  I'd estimate around 3.5lbs, maybe 4.
19.5 still wouldn't beat that japanese mutant at 22.4lbs
what was the bait, small ducklings?
Haha. The cutest I could find.

Don't care about the bass,well I do, but is that a Prospector "elite" Kevlar canoe with a full keel?  I had the exact same one. Nice and light, could lift it up with one hand and hold it away from my body at a 90. 36lbs if I recall.
You got it. Its a beautiful and light canoe... 100 percent kevlar, I don't think you can buy those anymore as the new ones are composite. Good eye.
Clean looking bucket Chad How come you're not lipping the beast??  Too heavy or what
haha that's a good question.... I always forget to do it. Us walleye guys have much to learn about bass fishing, and walleye thumb isn't a pretty sight.
